org.swiftgantt.model
Class GanttModel

java.lang.Object
  org.swiftgantt.model.GanttModel

public class GanttModel
extends java.lang.Object

Represent the data model of the GanttChart, consist of KickOffTime, Deadline and a TaskTreeModel.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yuxing Wang
